name: Rakesh Salunkhe
headline: Senior Software Engineer
about: Hi, I’m a .NET Developer with over 5 years of experience in building scalable web applications.
I hold a Bachelor’s in Computer Science from the University of Pune and a PG-DAC from CDAC, Mumbai.
I’ve worked on several domains including Healthcare, Banking, Finance for domestic as well as international clients, focusing on delivering secure and high-performing solutions.
My technical expertise includes ASP.NET, .NET Core, C#, Entity Framework, JavaScript, SQL Server, MySQL, Azure, and related web technologies.

projects.Name: Admin Portal
projects.Description: Internal application developed for IndusInd Bank; added unit tests for existing applications.

projects.Name: Remittance
projects.Description: Banking application used by IndusInd Bank; added unit tests for existing app.

projects.Name: Wrapper Portal

projects.Name: IndusDirect Web

projects.Name: Chatbot (OpenAI GPT Bot)
projects.Description: Chatbot built using Dotnet Core and Azure OpenAI for intelligent responses.

projects.Name: GPT Integration
projects.Description: Integrated chatbot into existing ASP.Net application using Azure OpenAI.

projects.Name: Exact Online (CRM)
projects.Description: CRM application for global Exact Online users.

projects.Name: DMDA2.0: Security Issue Fixes (Compliance Issues)
projects.Description: Resolved critical security issues in Document Management and Abstraction system.

projects.Name: Scribble Application
projects.Description: Web app for chart note management with smart note features and audio streaming.

projects.Name: Scribble Redox: EHR Integration
projects.Description: Integrated Scribble product with Redox EHR API using Google Pub-Sub model.

projects.Name: Sync Scribble
projects.Description: Workflow management app for operations teams with real-time communication.

Responsibilities: Worked closely with client and team to deliver solutions as per requirements.
Followed Agile Methodology and coding standards.
Performed unit testing, code review, and documentation.
Developed end-to-end intelligent solutions for complex business requirements.
Wrote test cases to ensure product performance.
Developed solutions across varied business requirements using latest technologies.
Handled healthcare applications with large datasets.
Derived insights to assist operations teams.
